title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin breaks down the Chargers missing an opportunity to make the playoffs following their loss to the Raiders and why we have to put the blame on their first year head coach Brandon Staley. He reacts to the shocking NFL news that the Dolphins announced they are firing head coach Brian Flores after back to back winning seasons. He tells you why he was right about 49ers QB Jimmy Garoppolo and wrong about the Raiders. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl champion and NFL on FOX analyst Jimmy Johnson joins the show to explain the balance between analytics and situational football. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
